description: Captures natural language text from user messages for later English review.

hooks.prompt:
Extract natural language text from the user's message.

Rules:
- REMOVE code blocks, inline code, file paths, URLs, CLI commands, technical identifiers
- KEEP only natural language text (English sentences, phrases, explanations)
- If the message is ONLY code or very short (1-3 words like yes/ok/thanks) â†’ output the no-text JSON below

You MUST output ONLY valid JSON, nothing else. Pick one:

If natural language found:
{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":"ENGLISH_TEXT_CAPTURED\n[the extracted natural language text]"}}

If no natural language:
{"hookSpecificOutput":{"hookEventName":"UserPromptSubmit","additionalContext":"NO_TEXT"}}
